caption.title: HCPS risk upper limits.
caption.p: Map of upper limits of Hantavirus infection risk according to the five scenarios evaluated: (A) sugar cane expansion, (B) temperature anomalies of RCP4.5, (C) and RCP8.5 scenarios, (D) RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios combined with sugar cane expansion (D and E, respectively). Local values (municipalities) are indicated in each map, as well as maximum values for HCPS risk.
Click here for additional data file.
